DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate excretion balance , metabolic profile route excretion [ 14C ] PF-04991532 healthy adult male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Single Dose Study To Study The Absorption , Metabolism And Excretion Of PF-04991532
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . An informed consent document sign date subject . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) clinical finding Screening . History irregular bowel movement ( eg , irritable bowel syndrome frequent episode diarrhea constipation ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , appendectomy , gastrectomy ) .
